name: priority-worker-queue
description: Priority function queue with hrtime considerations

scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.readme: jsdoc2md --template README.hbs --files ./lib/* > README.md && git add README.md

author: Mudrekh Goderya
